Package model

Class Car

java.lang.Object
model.Car
public class Car extends Object
Represents a car in the simulation. The car can move to a target position and change direction.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Car()
    Constructs a Car with the specified position, dimensions, and icon.

  • Method Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Car

      public Car()
      Constructs a Car with the specified position, dimensions, and icon.
      Parameters:
      x - the initial x-coordinate of the car
      y - the initial y-coordinate of the car
      width - the width of the car
      height - the height of the car
      icon - the icon representing the car
